bookAuthors: Cassandra Clare, Sarah Rees Brennan, Melissa Fumero
Plot: 3 Hours and 35 Minutes Alec Lightwood, partner of the High Warlock of Brooklyn and father of a warlock child, is sent to Buenos Aires to re-establish the Shadowhunters amidst the ruins left by the Dark War. When he arrives, he is not welcomed by the Shadowhunters there. He believes it is because of his companion Lily, the head of the New York vampire clan, until a Shadowhunter orphan confides a dark secret to him under cover of the Shadow Market.
Characters: Magnus Bane, Lily Chen, Alexander "Alec" Lightwood, Jonathan "Jace" Wayland, Theresa Gray, James "Jem" Carstairs
Setting: New York City, New York (United States)
